statements: SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM Researchers;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE research_area = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM Researchers WHERE institution = 'University X' ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE research_area LIKE '%Data Science%' OR research_area LIKE '%AI%';
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM Researchers WHERE research_area = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE INSTR(researcher_name, 'John') > 0;
SELECT DISTINCT research_area FROM Researchers ORDER BY research_area ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, email FROM Researchers WHERE institution = 'Oxford University';
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage;
SELECT id, researcher_id, date FROM Water_Usage WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT nutrient_name, nutrient_amount FROM Nutrient_Content WHERE nutrient_amount > 10;
SELECT * FROM Nutrient_Content ORDER BY nutrient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage WHERE water_consumed < 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage WHERE id = 1
SELECT researcher_id, date FROM Water_Usage WHERE water_consumed > 10 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT researcher_id, SUM(water_consumed) AS total_water_consumed FROM Water_Usage GROUP BY researcher_id HAVING total_water_consumed > 100
SELECT WC.id, NC.nutrient_name, NC.nutrient_amount FROM Water_Usage WC JOIN Nutrient_Content NC ON WC.researcher_id = NC.researcher_id
SELECT researcher_id, COUNT(*) AS num_entries FROM Water_Usage GROUP BY researcher_id ORDER BY num_entries DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage WHERE id = 1;
SELECT researcher_id, usage_amount FROM Nutrient_Content ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT id, emission_type, emission_amount FROM Greenhouse_Gas_Emissions WHERE emission_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT researcher_id, nutrient_type, nutrient_amount FROM Nutrient_Content WHERE nutrient_amount < 50 ORDER BY nutrient_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT researcher_id, SUM(usage_amount) AS total_usage FROM Water_Usage GROUP BY researcher_id HAVING total_usage > 100
SELECT * FROM Nutrient_Content WHERE nutrient_amount > 5 ORDER BY nutrient_amount DESC
SELECT researcher_id, AVG(emission_amount) AS avg_emission FROM Greenhouse_Gas_Emissions GROUP BY researcher_id ORDER BY avg_emission ASC
SELECT researcher_id, nutrient_type, nutrient_amount FROM Nutrient_Content JOIN Water_Usage ON Nutrient_Content.researcher_id = Water_Usage.researcher_id WHERE measurement_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, affiliation FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_id, name, affiliation FROM researchers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM water_usage GROUP BY researcher_id;
SELECT researcher_id, gas_type, SUM(emission_value) AS total_emissions FROM gas_emissions GROUP BY researcher_id;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, affiliation FROM researchers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_water_usage FROM water_usage;
SELECT researcher_id, COUNT(*) AS total_emissions FROM gas_emissions GROUP BY researcher_id;
SELECT researcher_id, MAX(value) AS max_nutrient_value FROM nutrient_content GROUP BY researcher_id ORDER BY max_nutrient_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage
SELECT water_source, water_amount FROM Water_Usage
SELECT water_amount, water_source FROM Water_Usage
SELECT water_id, water_source FROM Water_Usage WHERE water_amount > 100
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage WHERE water_source = 'River'
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage WHERE water_id = 1;
SELECT water_amount, water_id FROM Water_Usage WHERE water_amount > 100;
SELECT water_id, water_source FROM Water_Usage WHERE water_source LIKE '%river%';
SELECT water_source FROM Water_Usage ORDER BY water_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(water_amount) AS avg_water_amount FROM Water_Usage;
